definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Prescription drugs represent only about one-tenth of all health care spending in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 处方药仅占美国医疗保健费用的十分之一。

sentences.english: Perhaps only tenth of them will grow.
sentences.chinese: 大概只有十分之一的橡子能够成长。

sentences.english: Blade volume is about 1/10th that of rack-mount servers.
sentences.chinese: 刀锋的容量只是机架型伺服器的十分之一。

sentences.english: One in 10 adults thought it was a deer
sentences.chinese: 十分之一的成年人以为这是野鹿。

sentences.english: In the one case, the tenth is collected by men who die;
sentences.chinese: 在这里收十分之一的都是必死的人。

sentences.english: Ant genomes are about one-tenth of the size of human genomes.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁基因组是人类基因组片段大小的十分之一。

sentences.english: She set aside one-tenth of her salary each month.
sentences.chinese: 她每个月将薪水的十分之一存起来。

sentences.english: I fast twice a week, I give tithes of all that I get.
sentences.chinese: 我每周两次禁食，凡我所得的，都捐献十分之一。

sentences.english: The population of Tokoyo is one tenth of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 东京的人口是日本人口的十分之一。

sentences.english: To my estimate, not one tenth of the area is affected.
sentences.chinese: 按我的估计受灾的面积还不到十分之一。

sentences.english: About one in ten-thousand people are born with this disease.
sentences.chinese: 约十分之一的人遗传到这种病。

sentences.english: A minute is one sixtieth part of an hour.
sentences.chinese: 一分钟是一小时的六十分之一部份。

sentences.english: This is said to be equivalent to about one-tenth of the total used by restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 这相当于餐饮行业总用油量的十分之一。

sentences.english: It's one-twentieth the thickness of a human hair.
sentences.chinese: 它相当于人头发丝的二十分之一那样细。

sentences.english: He achieved a temperature of within one-tenth of a degree above absolute zero.
sentences.chinese: 他实现了高出绝对零度不到十分之一度的温度。

sentences.english: One twentieth of the total output was exported.
sentences.chinese: 产量中有二十分之一出口。
